damaging-no-tooltip: No this edit is not damaging and can be kept as is.
damaging-yes-tooltip: Yes this edit is damaging and should be reverted.
goodfaith-help: Does it appear as though the author of this edit was trying to contribute productively?
goodfaith-no-tooltip: No this edit appears to have been made in bad-faith.
goodfaith-yes-tooltip: Yes this edit appears to have been made in good-faith.
